patterns: Tell me about the Medical Centre
What is the Medical Centre?
Where is the Health and Wellness Center?
Can you tell me about the Health and Wellness Center?
What facilities does the Medical Centre offer?
responses: Welcome to our Institute Health and Wellness Center, your go-to destination for all your medical needs on campus! Nestled in the serene southern corner of our campus lies your gateway to well-being, our Health and Wellness Center. Here amidst the tranquil surroundings, you'll discover a haven dedicated to nurturing your health and vitality since 2018.

patterns: How can I contact the Medical Centre?
What is the email of the Medical Centre?
What is the phone number of the Medical Centre?
How to reach out to the Medical Centre?
responses: You can contact the Medical Centre by email at medical.center@iitjammu.ac.in or call at 01912570636. We're always here to assist you!

patterns: What are the facilities at the Medical Centre?
List the facilities offered at the Health and Wellness Center
What services does the Medical Centre provide?
responses:
The Medical Centre provides the following facilities:
- Dental facilities
- Ward facility
- Minor OT/Dressing Room
- Physiotherapy
- Laboratory services
- ECG Services
- Pharmacy
- Ambulance Services

patterns: Tell me about Dr. Karunika
Who is Dr. Karunika?
What qualifications does Dr. Karunika have?
How can I contact Dr. Karunika?
responses: Dr. Karunika is a specialist with qualifications in MBBS, MD, PGDHHM, and a Diploma in Ultrasonography. She has over 10 years of experience. You can reach her at karunika.sharma@iitjammu.ac.in or call +91 95967 45001.

patterns: Tell me about Dr. Vikram Singh
Who is Dr. Vikram Singh?
What qualifications does Dr. Vikram Singh have?
How can I contact Dr. Vikram Singh?
responses: Dr. Vikram Singh holds an MBBS degree and has 2.5 years of experience. You can contact him at medical.gdmo3@iitjammu.ac.in or call +91 99060 16244.

patterns: Tell me about Dr. Priya
Who is Dr. Priya?
What qualifications does Dr. Priya have?
How can I contact Dr. Priya?
responses: Dr. Priya is an MBBS graduate with 6 months of experience in psychiatry. You can reach her at medical.gdmo@iitjammu.ac.in or call +91 70064 66731.

patterns: Tell me about Dr. Bidisha
Who is Dr. Bidisha?
What qualifications does Dr. Bidisha have?
How can I contact Dr. Bidisha?
responses: Dr. Bidisha is an MBBS graduate with 1 year of experience. You can contact her at medical.gdmo5@iitjammu.ac.in or call +91 700601 75069.

patterns: Tell me about Dr. Pranav Gupta
Who is Dr. Pranav Gupta?
What qualifications does Dr. Pranav Gupta have?
How can I contact Dr. Pranav Gupta?
responses: Dr. Pranav Gupta has qualifications in B.D.S, M.D.S, and Fellowship of the Faculty of Applied Clinical Sciences (F.F.A.C). He has 7 years of experience. You can reach him at medical.gdmo4@iitjammu.ac.in.

patterns: Who is Dr. Rohit Bhatiya?
Tell me about Dr. Rohit Bhatiya
What is the role of Dr. Rohit Bhatiya?
responses: Dr. Rohit Bhatiya is a Visiting Physiotherapist at the Medical Centre. For appointments, please contact the Medical Centre directly.

patterns: Where is the Medical Centre located?
Tell me the address of the Medical Centre
What is the address of the Health and Wellness Center?
responses: The Medical Centre is located at: Medical Centre, Indian Institute of Technology Jammu, Jagti, NH-44, PO Nagrota, Jammu - 181 221, J&K, India.
